channel.title: Blogs on Privacy Discussions in Toronto
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Privacy Discussions in Toronto

item.title: Privacy 101: An Open Discussion - 16th of May 2017
item.description: The first Privacy Discussion will be held the 16th of May 2017 at the 519 Community Center from 6pm to 8pm. Program Introduction What Is Threat Modelling (10 minutes) Workshop - Strategies Of Resistance (45 minutes) Break (10 minutes) Talk : Chat Apps / Secure Passwords Open Discussion : ask all your question to our facilitators around drinks What you should bring Your curiosity and concerns Your motivation Something to take notes Any device you are comfortable with (optional) Before coming to the event, please take some time to read the Code Of Conduct
